title: MERN Stack Developer
description: Developed and styled interactive web applications for Vamos using React JS and SCSS.
Built and shipped MERN stack projects for various companies, focusing on third-party and internal API integrations.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy scalable web applications.
Implemented full-stack solutions using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js to enhance client platforms.
Worked with RESTful APIs to integrate external services, ensuring seamless data flow across applications.
Optimized application performance, reducing load times and improving responsiveness.
Contributed to the creation of modular, reusable components and improved code quality with best practices in React.
Utilized Git and GitHub for version control and project collaboration within an Agile environment.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness to deliver a consistent user experience.
